law.catch_line: Forfeitures not to apply to certain cases.
law.text: None of the forfeitures declared by KRS 372.060 to 372.120 apply to cases of controversy between lessor and lessee, mortgagor and mortgagee, vendor and vendee or trustee and beneficiary.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 215.
